LanguageData.BuildWombat_Crate.label: Build 120mm Wombat Recoiless Anti-Tank Gun crate
LanguageData.BuildWombat_Crate.description: Use this to build a 120mm Wombat Recoiless Anti-Tank Gun, a type of stationary manned turret. It uses 120mm cannon shell for ammo.
LanguageData.BuildWombat_Crate.jobString: Build 120mm Wombat Recoiless Anti-Tank Gun crate.
